title: How to Make a Steamer (Drink)

steps.headline: Measure the milk and put it in a heat and microwave safe measuring cup or mug.
Microwave the milk for approximately 1 minute 30 seconds, depending on your microwave.
steps.description: You want the milk to be hot, not just warm, or it won't dissolve the sugar.

steps.headline: Add the sugar.
steps.description: Stir until the sugar is dissolved.

steps.headline: Add the vanilla extract.
steps.description: Give the drink one final, quick, stir.

steps.headline: Let cool a few minutes before drinking.
